alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:55PM MST until February 21 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TUESDAY TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory ending this evening, snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory in effect for Tuesday afternoon through Wednesday, snow expected. Total additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Central Mountains. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 2 PM Tuesday to 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Occasional winter driving conditions can be expected on mountain routes through this evening. Widespread winter driving conditions can be expected Tuesday afternoon into Wednesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
